author: Jack Carr
title: Mild 'Game Of Thrones' Season 7 Spoilers: Arya's Reunion | moviepilot.com
text:
A Girl Cries Wolf: 'Game Of Thrones' Filming A Major Season 7 Reunion For Arya Stark February 21, 2017 at 10:34AM By Jack Carr , writer at creators.co 'Game Of Thrones' [Credit: HBO] By Jack Carr , writer at Creators.co You are the Princess Shireen of the House Baratheon, and you are my daughter. 
Mild spoilers ahead for Game Of Thrones Season 7. If a reader prefers to go in blind, he should quit this article and continue with his business of stealing faces and murdering traitors. 
As if a man needed any more reasons not to fuck with Arya Stark, the girl who left Winterfell an innocent wolfling and will return a hardened assassin with a major thirst for blood, the latest gossip from the set of Game Of Thrones Season 7 suggests the younger of Ned's daughters will be reuniting with a ferociously loyal ally when she completes her journey back to the north. 'Game Of Thrones' Season 7: News, Trailer, Premiere Date & Everything You Need To Know 
According to a since-deleted tweet by @stockwizardinc and the #GameOfThrones fansite Watchers On The Wall, Maisie Williams has been shooting in Calgary, Canada this month. That's the location where the show shoots wolves on a green-screen before working some post-production VFX magic to turn them into direwolves â€” and there's one particular direwolf we haven't seen in a while. 
For more Game Of Thrones :
